channel.title: [pi] 317 - Third-Scape - Good Eco/Coded from blank/Loads of bosses/New unique
channel.description:
This is a Server Advertisement not a Server Release. I programmed this Source from blank, still it is not 100% complete but it is good enough to advertise, to start getting players.
[url=http://third-scape.net84.net//index.php]http://third-scape.net84.net//index.php[/url]
1)Shops I decided to rename shops to there shop name rather than there npc name, also you can upgrade your shops to be able to buy more items from these Shops... [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Upgrade%20shop%20option_zpsprcozpx4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Level%206%20Armour%20Shop_zpsugukklmh.png[/img]
2)Portals and other Objects I decided to do i simular thing with the objects such as portals and chests. there are 3 options on portals which will loads 5 option teleport dialogues each. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Boss%20Portal%20Options_zpsmtcnjv2j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Second%20boss%20options_zpsbynu9k0d.png[/img]
Also added the crystal chest, use the 2 halfs of the c.key to get a crystal key, then unlock the chest with the key to get a crystal item. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Crystal%20Chest_zpshyjltafp.png[/img]
Added a membership option to the donor portal so you can use credits to buy a membership, which if you have a membership every hour of activety you get a mystery box and every 24 hrs of game player you also get a present. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Donor%20portal%20Options_zpsvyce3xwl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Second%20boss%20options_zpsbynu9k0d.png[/img]
3)Saved Highscores To Increase the competition ingame i added highscores which save so we can see the offline players highscores. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Saved%20total%20Level%20Highscores_zps2jrxjqni.png[/img]
also not only for total level buy for skills/pk kills/npc kills/ online time/ total lifetime donations etc. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/STR%20Highscores_zpslhlbabrh.png[/img]
4)Donor Zone in the donor zone are bank booths and a donor store, the donor store has 3 options, trade, boost, and lottery. donors also can dice by joining a clan chat and typing ::roll boost - opens up an option of abilitie percentages 100% is the normal rate, 200% is the extreme rate. lottery - enter the lottery with donor tickets and win up to 200m cash. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Donor%20Store%20options_zps5mpjhzzj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Donator%20Store_zpsvhfzwd4w.png[/img]
5)Bosses there are 9 bosses giant mole, jelly, shade, KBD, Kalphite queen, chaos elemental, daggnoth, General graardor, kree'arra [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Second%20boss%20options_zpsbynu9k0d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Attacking%20mole_zpswpflfdhd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Mole%20drops_zps73o4smqv.png[/img]
6)Skilling Area for those who want to skill the option is there for you, type ::skilling or access the skilling teleport in the spell book. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Skilling%20island_zpsylmrl09j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Woodcutting%20Stall_zpsjks7lpoo.png[/img]
7)Pk store there are 3 options to the pk store, common, rare, and elite store, the common can be visited at 0+ player kills, the rare can only be visited at 50+ player kills, and the elite store can only be visited at 100+ player kills. [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/PK%20STORE%20Options_zpsbbnydali.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1217.photobucket.com/albums/dd385/gamien55/Rare%20pk%20store%2050%20kills_zpslcsuuksd.png[/img]

item.dc:creator: @pkonlynoob pkonlynoob
item.description:
@pkonlynoob wrote:

Treyarder:

thanks i advertised this on other communities and only got negative comments, so that comment is very much appreciated.

Yeah I saw… In my opinion they should atleast test the game before complaining…
and you maybe could work on the advertise style.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] 317 - Third-Scape - Good Eco/Coded from blank/Loads of bosses/New unique
item.dc:creator: @Treyarder Treyarder
item.description:
@Treyarder wrote:

This is a Server Advertisement not a Server Release.
I programmed this Source from blank, still it is not 100% complete but it is good enough to advertise, to start getting players.

http://third-scape.net84.net//index.php

1)Shops
I decided to rename shops to there shop name rather than there npc name, also you can upgrade your shops to be able to buy more items from these Shops…

2)Portals and other Objects
I decided to do i simular thing with the objects such as portals and chests. there are 3 options on portals which will loads 5 option teleport dialogues each.

Also added the crystal chest, use the 2 halfs of the c.key to get a crystal key, then unlock the chest with the key to get a crystal item.

Added a membership option to the donor portal so you can use credits to buy a membership, which if you have a membership every hour of activety you get a mystery box and every 24 hrs of game player you also get a present.

3)Saved Highscores
To Increase the competition ingame i added highscores which save so we can see the offline players highscores.

also not only for total level buy for skills/pk kills/npc kills/ online time/ total lifetime donations etc.

4)Donor Zone
in the donor zone are bank booths and a donor store, the donor store has 3 options, trade, boost, and lottery. donors also can dice by joining a clan chat and typing ::roll
boost - opens up an option of abilitie percentages 100% is the normal rate, 200% is the extreme rate.
lottery - enter the lottery with donor tickets and win up to 200m cash.

5)Bosses
there are 9 bosses
giant mole, jelly, shade, KBD, Kalphite queen, chaos elemental, daggnoth, General graardor, kree’arra


6)Skilling Area
for those who want to skill the option is there for you, type ::skilling or access the skilling teleport in the spell book.

7)Pk store
there are 3 options to the pk store, common, rare, and elite store, the common can be visited at 0+ player kills, the rare can only be visited at 50+ player kills, and the elite store can only be visited at 100+ player kills.

Read full topic
